title.rendered: The Financial Commission is pleased to announce its newest member, RoboForex.

content.rendered:
The Commission was formed to provide traders with an alternative to legal or regulatory proceedings for resolving Forex related disputes with broker members of the Financial Commission.

Commenting on their membership, Financial Commission Chairman Peter Tatarnikov said, “We are proud to add RoboForex to our growing membership. We feel that RoboForex continues to make strides to provide the best trading experience for their clients which includes their membership and active participation in the Financial Commission”
Also commenting on joining the Financial Commission, RoboForex LP Commercial Director Eugene Antokhov said, “We feel that a transparent trading experience is crucial to assure clients that they are receiving proper trading execution and customer service. By joining the Financial Commission we are just taking one more step to ensuring that our clients are always treated fairly and will get the best possible experience trading with RoboForex.”

With the latest addition, the participating brokers of the Financial Commission are:

AForex
Alpari
FXOpen
FXFair
LionStone UK
MFX Broker
RoboForex

The Financial Commission features a Dispute Resolution Committee (DRC) comprised of senior members in the Forex industry. The DRC members include Carl Elsammak, CEO Kammas Trading; Ilan Azbel, CEO Autochartist; Francesc Riverola, Founder FXStreet; Simon Grunfeld, Partner Stone Street Solutions; Andrew Ralich, Co-Founder oneZero Solutions; Lior Nabat, CEO Tradency; Alexey Kutsenko CEO Tools4brokers; Kevin Millien President Millien Consulting Group and Ilya Sorokin, CEO Act Forex.
The DRC members bring diverse backgrounds, strong legal skills and extensive experience to the role. This experience will enable the DRC to review and resolve disputes providing both the broker and trader an amicable solution to any issues that arise in the course of Forex trading.

Interested parties can contact the Financial Commission at: http://xcv.financialcommission.org or via email info@financialcommission.org.

About RoboForex:
The RoboForex Company is an international forex broker, which has quickly become one of the leading financial services providers in the Forex market. RoboForex has gained the confidence of thousands of clients from over 100 different countries. From the moment of its foundation, RoboForex has always focused on creating a fair and user-friendly trading experience offering high quality services to its clients. The company’s main advantages are our flawless reputation, customer care, and innovative technologies.
www.roboforex.com
